mapper.insert: insert into ATTENDANCE values(#{_parameter}, to_date(to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select DISTINCT member_no from Attendance where ATTEND_DATE <= to_date(to_char(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ATTEND_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'DD')

select count(*) from attendance where ATTEND_DATE <= to_date(to_char(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ATTEND_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'DD') and member_no = #{_parameter}
mapper.insert: insert into ATTENDANCE values(#{_parameter}, to_date(to_char(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.select: select member_no as memberNo, to_char(attend_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as strAttendDate from attendance where ATTEND_DATE <= to_date(to_char(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'YYYY-MM-DD')||' 23:59:59', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and ATTEND_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-1' DAY), 'DD') and member_no = #{_parameter} order by attend_date
select avg_time as avgTime, avg_date as avgDate from ATTENDANCE_AVGTIME where avg_date < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') and avg_date >= TRUNC(SYSDATE + (INTERVAL '-7' DAY), 'DD') order by avg_date desc

select member_no as memberNo, to_char(attend_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as strAttendDate from attendance where ATTEND_DATE <= TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{start}, 'DD') and ATTEND_DATE > TRUNC(SYSDATE - #{end}, 'DD') and member_no = #{memberNo} order by attend_date
